doc:
Martin Kove https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Kove 0 Martin Kove (born March 6, 1946) is an American film and television actor most recognized for his role as the psychopathic Cobra Kai sensei John Kreese in the Karate Kid film series. He is also known for his work in films such as Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985) and on television series such as Cagney Lacey as Victor Isbecki. Martin_Kove ( born March_6_,_1946 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor most_recognized for his_role as the_psychopathic_Cobra_Kai sensei John_Kreese in the_Karate_Kid_film_series . He is_also_known for his_work in films such_as Rambo : First_Blood_Part_II_(_1985_) and on television_series such_as Cagney_ as Victor_Isbecki .
